name: Serpent of the Nile
description:
An interactive narrative and environmental storytelling game.

The story reveals a hidden lesson within, a scare and an awakening for a young boy named Kamari who was gifted a book that surpasses timezones.

To quiet his intrigue for his gift, he takes a closer look. As do we.

I used Ink and Unity to implement my writing and visual novel.

You can download below! Thank you for playing!
